This is my Quarto website.

**Sam Polzin** is the Senior Policy Analyst for Strategic Research in the Office of Performance Management and Innovation (OPMI) at the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority (MBTA).

I specialize in survey methodologies and have over six years of experience researching policy, systems, and environmental change. Presently, I manage the MBTA System-Wide Passenger Survey and work to help the T better understand the preferences and habits of different rider populations.
